Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Authorizes the county of Warren to offer an optional twenty-year retirement plan to Bradley Murphy, a patrol officer employed by such county
Summary: Authorizes the county of Warren to offer an optional twenty-year retirement plan to Bradley Murphy, a patrol officer employed by such county.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing the county of Warren to offer an optional twenty-year retirement plan to Bradley Murphy, a patrol officer employed by such county
